Hey, i would like to watch this on my xbox 360 via the media center extender but i cant get the subtitles to work so i try to burn them in using handbrake but then there are no subtitles at the italian parts even though i have selected those to be burned into the video file so what am i doing wrong? i have had this problem with harakiri and seven samurai aswell were i tried to get the english subs to work for the japanese audio but it didnt work aswell even though i had the right file selected and i had "burned in" on "yes" o.O so i must be doing something totally wrong here..

sorry, i don't own a console. but you can try this: download an *.srt format subtitle separately, name it "The Godfather.srt" and the media center or other player should automatically recognize it and play it. it's just an idea, but hey.
